Package com.btp.dataStructures.trees.GenericTrees

Class AVLTree<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.btp.dataStructures.trees.GenericTrees.AVLTree<T>
Type Parameters:
T - generic type of objects to possibly contain in the tree instance
public class AVLTree<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
the public class for the SplayTree instances. This code is based in the tutorial found in https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/avl-tree-set-1-insertion/, with major syntax modifications for using generic type nodes and getter/setter methods for data-scope reduction.

    • contains

      public boolean contains​(T element)
      Checks if an element is inside the tree. Calls the private constructor method
      Parameters:
      element - The element to be checked
      Returns:
      boolean true if the element is contained, false if not

    • findMin

      public T findMin()
      Finds the minimun element in the tree. Calls the recursive method findMin
      Returns:
      the smallest element found

    • findMax

      public T findMax()
      Finds the maximum element in the tree. Calls the private method findMax
      Returns:
      the biggest element found

    • insert

      public void insert​(T element)
      Calls the recursive method insert
      Parameters:
      element - the element to be inserted

    • insert

      public AVLNode<T> insert​(T element, AVLNode<T> current)
      Recursive method that inserts a new node in the tree
      Parameters:
      element - the element to be inserted
      current - the current node being compared
      Returns:
      the new TreeNode to be inserted

      Prints the tree using preOrder
      Parameters:
      node - Current Node to be printed
